subject: Haptic feedback reactor issues
description_text:
Output on for motor 3 is very weak, I swapped around motors and it's the box that's having issues. Not the motors themselves

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

conversations.body_text: Hi Scott Krause,    Please provide your order number and let us know what pedal you are using, and which model of Haptics. Is it our latest main control box?

Sorry! Problem solved, not sure exactly what happened but after moving the strength up 1% its now fully function and is adjustable. Pedals were just recently flashed by support team, thanks!

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
